name: chatGPT4 SAC - dataLoom
description: A custom widget to integrate chatGPT4 chat completions in SAC Analytic application using the OpenAI API

getCompletions.description: Wrapper for OpenAI API POST to fetch chat completions using OpenAI's GPT chat model

parameters.name: APIKey
parameters.description: The OpenAI API key used for authentication.

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: The input text that GPT should respond to.
